alerts.body: Parts of the San Antonio area have been impacted from a damaged fiber incident. Technicians are actively working to restore services. We apologize for the inconvenience.
alerts.title: Fiber Cut in Texas

alerts.body: You may notice a temporary delay in your Mobile data usage showing up on your account. Your data usage will be available again on March 11 at 1:00 AM ET.
alerts.title: Data Usage

alerts.body: You may qualify to receive up to $30 per month toward your internet bill. Complete this short online application form for your discount eligibility. ­­­
alerts.title: Affordable Connectivity Program:

alerts.body: Due to scheduled maintenance, you may notice delays or issues with the website. Your Spectrum Mobile service won’t be affected.
alerts.title: Employee Field Trial:

alerts.body: This is to test that SMB users can get alerts - Both RESI & SMB users can see this - Severity is Warning.
alerts.title: AUTOMATED TEST - SPECNET-35204 - Alert for SMB - Warning

alerts.body: This is to test that SMB users can get alerts - Both RESI & SMB users can see this - Severity is Caution.

alerts.body: This is to test that SMB users can get alerts - Both RESI & SMB users can see this - Severity is Info.

alerts.body: During this time, you won’t be able to manage appointments, or activate equipment for Spectrum Internet, TV or Voice. These services will be available to you again at 7AM ET.
alerts.title: We’re performing upgrades to improve your Spectrum experience.

alerts.body: If you want to manage an appointment, or activate Internet, Spectrum Video or Spectrum Voice equipment, those are temporarily unavailable, and will be available to you again at 7 AM ET.
alerts.title: We’re performing upgrades to improve your Spectrum experience.

alerts.body: There are storms that may be affecting service in your area. Please check our storm center for updates.
alerts.title: Severe Weather:

alerts.body: Payments or account changes for Spectrum Mobile are temporarily unavailable. Your mobile service won't be affected, and your full account options will be available by 7 AM ET
alerts.title: We’re upgrading our system to improve your experience

alerts.body: Spectrum Mobile: We are currently experiencing issues with eSIM activations. Please check back later
alerts.title: eSIM Activation Issues
